name: The North Alpha Build
description:
Currently in alpha testing. No NPC character assets or animations have been made yet. This is strictly testing the core game mechanics.

The North is a PS1 style exploration game. Talk to NPCs and try to solve a murder onboard an arctic exploration ship trapped in the ice. You play as Doctor David Barclay, the ship's surgeon and the one man above suspicion. Talk to the crew to get clues but beware, you are not a well liked or respected member of the HMS Ectorius.

5 levels and several alternative endings.

Press J to check your journal.

Press F or Space to interact.


Please post screenshots of errors as this is an alpha build specifically for testing the core mechanics of the game.
